name: Frogis FI-CS2W
headline: Ultra-compact 2" ceiling loudspeaker
description: Ultra-compact 2-inch ceiling speaker for discreet background music and paging in commercial interiors.
story: FI-CS2W is designed for contractors who need a compact, reliable ceiling speaker that blends into architectural environments. Its high-efficiency 2-inch full-range driver delivers clear speech and background music while the integrated transformer supports both 70V/100V line and low-impedance installations.
definition: Ultra-compact full-range ceiling loudspeaker for distributed audio systems.
specs: Integrated transformer with power tap selector
ABS housing with metal protective grille
Fast and secure ceiling mounting system

name: Frogis FI-CS3
headline: 3" magnetic ceiling loudspeaker
description: Compact 3-inch ceiling speaker with magnetic grille for clean architectural integration.
story: FI-CS3 combines compact dimensions with a high-flux neodymium driver, delivering clear speech and balanced background music. Its magnetic grille and lightweight construction simplify installation while maintaining a refined appearance.
definition: 3" full-range magnetic ceiling loudspeaker for indoor audio systems.

name: Frogis FI-CS4W
headline: 4" two-way ceiling loudspeaker
description: Two-way 4-inch ceiling speaker for clear speech and balanced music reproduction.
story: FI-CS4W uses a dedicated woofer and tweeter to improve clarity and detail in paging and background music systems. Its rotatable tweeter and magnetic grille make it flexible for both new installs and retrofits.
definition: Two-way ceiling loudspeaker for commercial audio installations.
specs: Two-way design with separate woofer and tweeter

name: Frogis FI-CS6BT
headline: 6.5" Bluetooth active ceiling speaker
description: All-in-one active ceiling speaker with built-in Bluetooth and amplifier.
story: FI-CS6BT integrates amplification and Bluetooth 5.0 directly into the ceiling, offering a clean and cable-free solution for hospitality and residential spaces where simplicity and aesthetics matter.

name: Frogis FI-CSUB6P
headline: 6" in-ceiling subwoofer
description: Compact in-ceiling subwoofer delivering powerful low-frequency reinforcement.
story: FI-CSUB6P provides the impact of a floor-standing subwoofer while remaining completely hidden in the ceiling. Its bass reflex design and acoustic back loading enclosure enhance low-frequency performance in distributed audio systems.
definition: Passive ceiling-mounted subwoofer for distributed audio systems.
drivers: 6" dynamic woofer with dual voice coils
specs: High SPL output in compact form

name: Frogis FI-HPS5
headline: 5" hanging pendant loudspeaker
description: Stylish hanging pendant speaker for wide-area background music and paging.
story: FI-HPS5 combines elegant industrial design with robust acoustic performance, making it ideal for open ceilings where traditional in-ceiling speakers are not possible.
definition: Two-way hanging pendant loudspeaker for indoor and outdoor use.
specs: High clarity speech and music reproduction

name: Frogis FI-HPS6
headline: 6.5" hanging pendant loudspeaker
description: High-power pendant speaker for large open commercial spaces.
story: FI-HPS6 scales up output and low-frequency performance while retaining the same elegant pendant form factor, ideal for demanding hospitality and public venues.
